title: Chat-App Convo
description: A real-time chat application built with the MERN stack, enabling one-to-one messaging, user authentication, and online status tracking. Features include a modern responsive UI, secure backend with JWT authentication, and deployment on Vercel/Render.

title: Notes-Making App
description: A full-stack MERN notes-taking web application that allows users to create, update, delete, and search notes. Features include user authentication, responsive UI, and persistent storage using MongoDB. Hosted on Render.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A fully responsive developer portfolio built using React, Vite, and CSS Modules. The website showcases professional skills, featured projects, and contact details. Designed with smooth animations and a modern UI, optimized for both desktop and mobile viewing.

title: Pity Python Snake Game
description: A fun web-based snake game developed using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Includes sound effects, score tracking, and increasing difficulty as the game progresses. Designed with a retro pixel theme for a nostalgic experience.

title: Smart Fetal Growth Prediction
description: Led a team to develop a ML-based system for monitoring and predicting fetal growth patterns over time.

title: Student Project Management
description: A web platform for managing student mini and major projects, with user role tracking and project database monitoring.
